title: land4health
text: Calculate extract remote sensing metrics spatial health analysis 🛰️. package offers R users quick easy way obtain areal zonal statistics key indicators covariates, ideal modeling infectious diseases 🦠 within framework spatial epidemiology 🏥.

text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like :
code: library(land4health) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00
